name: RiftBreak
description:
Go beyond the impossible in RiftBreak, a state-of-the-art, AAA-quality first-person shooter with an enthralling sci-fi storyline and intense, polished gameplay!

Step into the boots of Sid, an elite Agent, and embark on an awe-inspiring journey through time and space to stop a mysterious threat to humanity, Earth, and the Universe itself!

RiftBreak features:

  • 4K, high-resolution, AAA quality graphics and sound
  • High-intensity, tightly-polished first person shooter action
  • An arsenal of powerful, satisfying weapons. Rip and tear!
  • Nineteen chapters spanning many worlds and time periods
  • An expansive galaxy with deep, engrossing lore
  • Dynamic, rounded characters with voice acting
  • RPG-lite features, including inventory and character progression
  • Female protagonist

...and much, much more!

If you liked games like Halo, Titanfall, and Crysis, you'll love RiftBreak!

This game was actually created for So Bad It's Good Jam 2020. Set your expectations accordingly.
